website_summaries.verdict: Large diffuser box that will fit most styles of external flash units securely, all at a reasonable price.
pros: Diffuser attaches to the head of the flash with a Velcro strap to ensure a tight fit and to limit light leakage
Offered in three different sizes for various photography needs
Entire diffuser folds down to a small size so you can carry it easily in a camera bag
Should fit most flash units that attach to a hot shoe
cons: Aimed more at photographers with some experience with a mid-range price point

customer_reviews.title: Soft Box Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after a friend purchased one and was so happy. For the price, this is excellent. I used it yesterday and I had two photo outings on an dreary over cast day. This illuminated their faces so beautifully. Be sure to have extra batteries as when using flash it tends to use up more battery. I strongly recommend this and will share it with other members in my camera club
customer_reviews.author: Merlyn Law

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy, does not collapse once attached to the speedlite
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a light modifier for my Canon 430 EX II speedlite and found this. It's very sturdy, does not collapse once attached to the speedlite, and fits very snuggly due the velcro around the end. I actually prefer this to my Gary Fong light diffuser - that thing NEVER stays on my speedlite! It creates beautiful, soft light, enough at the lowest power output. I LOVE it for wedding receptions.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly M

customer_reviews.title: Heck yeah!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional wedding photographer and I will often find myself away from lighting equipment (set up on dance floor) at weddings. I use on-camera flash in those instances (usually pointed up). I think this will be great in high ceiling venues. First photo (properly exposed) is with the soft box on, second is with it off. So impressed with this, esp for the price! Fits perfectly on my 600 ex-rt.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: A must for a beginner like me!
customer_reviews.text: I love having this diffuser specially when taking photos during the night or low light situation as it soften the shadows.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine Villaluz

customer_reviews.title: Wish id purchase alot sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my flash and I swear I want to kick myself for not getting this sooner. My pictures are amazing. Just received today 4.26.2017 and I tested it in my room with my new backdrops and I'm in love . I didn't even bother setting up in my studio . I tested everything in my dark room and thus works AMAZING in combination with my new flash pictures look like I'd they were taken outside.. I strongly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: janette guidoTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I finally used it last night and it worked perfect. Photograph myself and played around with a background
customer_reviews.author: Faithful Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: !!!Outstanding quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fist off I order items off Amazon about 3 times a month and the first thing I noticed was the packaging! It looks like someone actually cares about their product! 2nd I noticed the quality of the product, it was really thick, same for stitching! It doesn't fold under wind load as the edges are VERY firm, unlike the cheap ones. Brings your flash down 1-2 stops down in my opinion! Over all very satisfied and will purchase 2 more for my other speedlights! 9/10
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality diffuser for Nikon SB-800 and macrophotography
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made diffuser with good stitching of materials. Fits my Nikon SB800 well and works quite well for my primary intended purpose of providing non-specular light for macrophotography. I overlooked that there were multiple sizes, otherwise I might have opted for the 9x7" size.
customer_reviews.author: DPTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, there are much better diffusers
customer_reviews.text: The diffusers only work front facing and don't work well to bounce the light because the sides are black. It causes shadows while shooting. The diffusers are floppy and don't stay where you need them. Not worth the $35 I paid. If you want a cheap diffuser, use a regular plastic diffuser cap that fits right over the top of the flash. Otherwise, spend a little bit more for a diffuser that gives off a full range of light.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Effective, sturdy lightweight difuser that travels flat.  Perfect.  Greatly softens harsh light from flashes.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best light diffusers that I have used and I have many. They travel flat in a camera bag +. They have a sturdy wire frame ++. The part that connects to the flash is held tight by a sturdy, elastic, Velcro fastener that fits most flash heads +++. The inside has a nice rubber-like grip to keep it from slipping ++++. The best yet are the pictures that result from a much softer light. Look no further, these from Digital Goja are the best. I tried one and ordered more. Each one comes with a sturdy protective pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Rocko

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good! Mine just came with a small black marking on it. The photos are amazing regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Softbox
customer_reviews.text: It's a little too small to be useful to me. But it's better than nothing. I tried using this on my insect photography with fair results. But it didn't produce the level of soft light I wanted. It does fold up nicely and takes up little room in the bag so it gets 4 stars. I will use it until I get a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: BillD

customer_reviews.title: Nice to use and do the job.
customer_reviews.text: These work great at deflecting light, but for some reason, they cast a weird purplish projection. So, if they are used outside under sunlight, they work better than indoors where more light bounces from the sides. I have used them with Youngnous, and I'll be trying a Neewer flash to see if the same effect appears again. But, yes they are worth the money and work great.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA B.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product
customer_reviews.text: If you want a compact diffuser for on camera flash, this is a good choice. On camera flash can deliver acceptable results, especially up close for small subjects, and turning the flash power down. I especially like this diffuser, as it has an elastic closure for mounting on the flash. I can cinch the closure down and get sturdy fit on my small Godox TT350S flash. It comes in a nice pouch and folds up quite compact for walking around. There is a loop on the pouch for a small belt hook. I have tried various on camera flash diffusers, including diy, and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Sonnonstine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this little diffuse for the price. The stitching is high quality around the corners and the edges are made of a quality, high end canvas of some sort. What I really like is that the velcro strap is elastic, so you can pull the diffuser onto your flash head and then pull the elastic tight before sticking the velcro down. It results in a tight fit on my Canon Speedlite and I do not have concerns about it coming off while I am shooting. Overall 5 stars and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. The durability, and ease of use is seriously impressive. The quality surpassed all expectations. Goes on easy and the strap that tightens it is very snug.. I never have issues with it sagging or drooping down during a shoot. I'm sure people who man handle their equipment will have issues. But I always take gentle care and preserve mine in its pouch and it keeps just fine. I love doing portraits with this. And even weddings come out gorgeous without that huge flash that blinds everyone. It's very subtle. I have the small size and it's perfect. Any bigger it would just be silly..
customer_reviews.author: JeeperGirl

customer_reviews.title: Sides are a wee bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I went for the 3-pack. As a softbox, the two largest models are very adequate for indoor/low light use. I didn't find much use for the smallest, as I got about as much glare on my greasy mug as I did when shooting with the diffuser on my speedlight. Unfortunately, as others have stated, the sides tend to collapse when in use. I'm not sure if this annoyance is enough to force me to buy something else, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: MasterBlaster

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I see little diffused lighting when using this compared to straight flash. Better off using bounce flash. ***updated rating from 2 to 4 stars* Changing my star rating based on the customer service alone. After my initial review, the company refunded my purchase. So, if you're on the fence about this product. Try it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mcknight

customer_reviews.title: BEst option for reducing the amount of equipment you carry
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my Nikon SB700 flash. I normally shoot natural light portraits, but this softbox comes in handy for use on a bounce flash so you don't have to haul around bulky flash equipment. Works well to diffuse flash over the subject from any angle. It slides over the lens housing and secures with a stretch hook&pile for a nice fit. Biggest plus is that it folds flat & fits nicely in the zipper pouch provided with it. It tucks away nicely in my camera bag without taking up much space.
customer_reviews.author: M.Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional photographer looking into getting a light soft box and others related in general. I bought this thinking that it would reduce the amount of sharp light hitting the object, but it does not. It looks the same and does not made light any softer. I am very disappointed with this product, if I were you, I would invest more money and get a larger and better quality soft box.
customer_reviews.author: Bluesky

customer_reviews.title: No replacement for a softbox
customer_reviews.text: Not the best diffusion of light, but much better than a bare flash. Update: Company reached out to me after reviewing, and did everything they could to make the situation better. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: tim macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Cumbersome and floppy. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. I'm an event photographer (daveingraham.com) and I shoot a lot of corporate events. I was hoping this would provide a bit softer light than simply using the basic flash diffuser, but all it did was get in the way and make my camera cumbersome. The one time I tried using it, I ended up spending way too much time fiddling with it, and took it off halfway through the shoot.
customer_reviews.author: pixelninja

customer_reviews.title: I love this diffuser, worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I lost a Gary Fong lightsphere, and I bought this while waiting for it to ship. I had to shoot a party in a super low light nightclub, and was worried that this cheap diffuser would fall apart or just make the light look bad. I was wrong. I shot some of my favorite pics ever with this thing. It goes on super easy and flat packs small into even my smallest camera backpack. Super impressed!
customer_reviews.author: pinguino kolb

customer_reviews.title: Solid build quality, compact, useful.
customer_reviews.text: When it came in, I was a little apprehensive. The package when it came was flat, but after opening it up and seeing how it was built, it made sense. Pretty nifty. It just slides over your flash and it is a nice subtle flash compared to bright glare or hard light or over exposed photos due to the flash. I will use this when I shoot a wedding at the end of this year. It will be perfect to add a little bit of light to the subjects without an overkill of my flash. I’ll change my review based upon use.
customer_reviews.author: Wittyography

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Photos
customer_reviews.text: The 9"x7" flash diffuser by Altura Photo attaches quickly and securely to my flash and stays where it's supposed to (I've had issues with other diffusers slipping and getting in the way of flash functionality). The size seems to be just right. Not too big and bulky, but large enough to get the job done. Based on other reviews, I had concerns that I would have issues with creases from flat folding and storing it in the bag, but it folds down easily (and flat!) and it opens up as expected without any funky creasing. This diffuser does exactly what the name says: diffuses and softens the flash, creating beautiful, evenly-lit, soft photos. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: brinky365

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good lightbox
customer_reviews.text: We used these for hundreds of macro shots of critters in Ecuador.. They fit on two different types of strobe without difficulty. We had a chance to compare a larger softbox under the exact same circumstances. The degree of modification of the light was not quite as great, but these were a good compromise between practicality (size) and function. They fold up into a tiny package that's easy to carry/pack
customer_reviews.author: RWS

customer_reviews.title: Dont use your speedlight without it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutley love this! I dont use my speed light on the hotshoe without it. It diffuses flash beautifully and illuminates subjects without harshness. Its lightweight, sturdy, folds up easily, its well made and fits all of my speedlights. This is made just like a standard softbox only mini with reflective material on the inside. Again, I love this and it has changed my photography for the better. I plan to buy another one in the future for a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Rita L.

customer_reviews.title: Portable softbox
customer_reviews.text: I used it with a Canon 480 Ex II Speedlite. Works perfectly with my speedlite. Fits sung, do not have to worry about falling off. Projects a lot of light, even when flash turned done. Extremely portable, folds flat to fit at the bottom of my camera bag. Comes with a neat little pouch. Better than the plastic cap i was using to diffuse light from my flash. Very impressive with low budget tech to improve the quality of my pictures inside and outside
customer_reviews.author: Benjistuie

customer_reviews.title: 9 x 7 is perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I received my 9 x 7 diffuser today Quick shipping service but when my item arrived the diffuser has a crease in an odd position. I tried to unfold opposite of the crease but still has that kink in a awkward position. I like the idea of a portability, light weight. It’s a great idea.. I used it tonight with my Nikon SB600 tried different settings I’m gonna try to stretch it overnight and see if it take the goods out.
customer_reviews.author: rey

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive and good set of speedlight "softboxes"
customer_reviews.text: These are well made, easy to use, and do a good job of putting a small "softbox" on the front end of a speedlight. I find that for situations when you want to significantly soften the light from a speedlight, but still have it projected in one direction (towards the front, rather than bounced off the ceiling, etc.), these work very well. They also work very well when doing product photography of small, tabletop objects. I find that with a couple of these on a couple of speedlights I often don't need to use a light tent.
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly this diffuser works well !
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about this diffuser but after using it multiple times I’ve found it to work pretty well. Sure, it seems to good to be true but this diffuser is easy to put on and take off my Nikon speed light , it folds up flat and fits in my camera bag with no problem. The diffuser does a good job spreading out the light from my flash and I’ve had good results with it so far. The material seems to be pretty sturdy and I think this will hold up well. This comes with a case that has a zipper which is a plus. For the price this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: This flash diffuser works as expected, nothing fancy. the size is decent on the speedlite and it's not too heavy as you walk around with it. It came kinda crushed but that's the beauty of a fabric diffuser... it'll still diffuse wrinkled or not.. it's just a little goofy to have a half erect diffuser over your speedlite. for what they charge.. I am not complaining.. I just wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: LCStone

customer_reviews.title: Nice little flash modifer
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this little softbox! It comes in a nice nylon zippered bag and easily attaches to any portable flash unit. It doesn't take any room in my equipment bag and it replaces a vinyl softbox that I wasn't a fan of. It has a silver reflective interior which helps getting the most light out of the unit and I would consider a second one for a nice two light set-up.
customer_reviews.author: pro photographer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent materials, bright, easy to adapt to my flash.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Flash Diffuser, intending to improve my macro photography. Comes wih a pouch to store the diffuser, you can adapt to tehe llash in a matter of seconds. First time I used it, one of my grandchildren was delighted to help me as the lightman. I was using the flash in the remote mode. He is now back home, and I'm using it all olone. I really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. JPSanchez

customer_reviews.title: Great Diffuser Softbox, no more harsh light
customer_reviews.text: Most flashes come with a diffuser cover made of plastic so small that we tend to lose them as I have several times. This is a collapsible softbox with it's own pouch that straps with velcro around your existing flash and it stays on. There is no need to fiddle around with it once it is on. Comes in 3 different sizes but for myself this is the perfect size for most flashes without looking like you are using a gigantic piece of equipment drawing unnecessary attention. An inexpensive and convenient way to diffuse your speedlight. Very happy with the product and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Mo

customer_reviews.title: Works well for small flashes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Godox TT350o and it fits well. Other diffusers were too large. This one is still a tiiiiny bit big, but it's close enough that it works. You could use it for a medium-sized flash as well, but if you're going to do that I'd recommend getting a larger diffuser so you can diffuse over a larger surface area.
customer_reviews.author: WillMcK91

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for wedding photography!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried SO many different flash setups before finding what works for me. I love this diffuser because I feel like I am always able to create consistent images that match my style. I attach this to my flash and have it pointed towards the couple. I don't even need an off camera flash! I love love love the look of this. So cheap and will change your reception photos and make you so much more confident!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nifty Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Good diffuser, but sometimes awkward to attach to the strobe. Once attached, it serves its purpose and does not come loose. I use it for lots of macro photos of flowers and it meets my needs completely.
customer_reviews.author: R.A. Pesky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on-the-go to diffuse the intensity of a speedlight!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for outdoor photo shoots when you need just a little light to balance the sun or in the shade. Also great for indoors when you don't need the full power of a speedlight.
customer_reviews.author: @MrBrightside816

customer_reviews.title: Using for product photography
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had any issues with this. I use them mostly for product photography, so I'm not dragging them all over the city or any thing like that. I used them on the amazon flashes. They do a good job of diffusing the light so that I don't have to use plug in lights and longer shutter speeds. I've not used them for people so I can't speak to that.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Straps Tight Around the Flash
customer_reviews.text: This soft box is perfect. It straps tight around the flash, softens the light, easily folds up, and comes in a nice little drawstring bag. I have absolutely nothing bad to say about it. If you need a softbox for your flash, this is the one to get :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Cannell

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Nice even diffusion and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Using with Yongnuo flashes. Very nice! Nice even diffusion and a great price. REAL value for the money. I have one of those more expensive "bendy" diffusers and what a hassle compared to this one. I like Altura's style with packaging with nifty re-usable zip lock pouches and a microfiber cloth to boot.
customer_reviews.author: NotSure@Dystopia

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, folds up nicely and comes with an easy to adjust Velcro wrap so that it will fit easily on most any flash. It would take a very large flash, larger than any one that I have ever used for this not to be able to fit on it. It also performs very nicely at diffusing the light and softening it nicely. I have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: jr1234Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: This softbox is versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a wedding recently, to diffuse the light from my flash and boy am I glad I bought this! It did exactly what it was supposed to do, and it will be useful in the future for portraits! Great at diffusing the light!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Needed a diffuser and this one works great
customer_reviews.text: Just finished a photo shoot using this diffuser in a fill-flash portrait case. I was surprised that the flash intensity was still quite high with this diffuser -- seems like as much light as without it. The results looked great and I won't be doing any flash photography without it from now on. Folds up great and has a nice carrying pouch to keep it clean. Excellent value!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne S. Pelouch

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product for An On Camera Flash
customer_reviews.text: The product performed as I imagined it would. It diffused the light coming from my on camera flash, and was most noticeable when I used it to bounce light. I can only assume it is durable. I've not used it long enough to determine how durable it is, however it does seem to be constructed fairly well, and is easy to store and retrieve when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Singleton

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Its a nice little design that helps on the go. I wish it some kind of way to add an extra layer of thickness that i could probably add to it to make just the right amount of softness but im not by any means a professional so maybe more expensive ones have it or maybe im asking for to much for this type of device but i do like it and the extra layer thing i was talking about would be more of a convenience addition and It would not be needed most times
customer_reviews.author: michael hudson

customer_reviews.title: Good to add, but not essential
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, though it seems a little small. I've typicalled had to double diffuse (diffuser cap on with this over to, or this on and then bounce off a reflector). But I have yet to use this in an outdoors, midday/early evening situation.
customer_reviews.author: Multi-Interest guy

customer_reviews.title: Quck and easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a way to diffuse on camera flash for events. Very impressed with the quality of these little hotshoe flash soft boxes. They setup and collapse easily and are so easy to attach to the flash with the included velcro. The three pack is a great value. Obviously larger modifiers are better and off camera when you can choose that option, but for an on camera solution for events such as Weddings these are great. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Schooler

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck portability
customer_reviews.text: Using these for macro and they help defuse the light of a flash gun . They fit on nicely and very secure. They fold up flat and have a case to slip them into . I also tried the largest one for some quick portraits and it left a nice soft wrap around of light . They are of good quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: troy phillips

customer_reviews.title: Low-cost and amazing results what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning results with this diffuser. Or use it on my flash and I’ve bounced it off of the ceiling and off of the walls. Shadows are not as harsh and light blends perfectly around objects and contours . Folds easily into a storage bag which is included and it has an internal extra light diffuser for even more light diffusing.Low-cost an amazing results what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Great results with this diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how well this diffuser preforms, especially for the price. It really does soften the light up wonderfully. Folding up and put into a flat bag makes it super easy to find a spot in the camera bag. With both diffusing elements (there's another fabric diffuser instead) there's just no comparison with those plastic box-like diffusers: this crushes them.
customer_reviews.author: Expat Photographer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent for the price. My biggest issue is the adhesive grip from preventing it sliding around. That and it doesn’t really fit my flash great. Overall it’s a decent option if you need a diffuser that isn’t expensive but just know there are more options out there for a slightly higher price point that would be more ideal if you wanted something mid tier.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Functions as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on, and take off but doesn't seem to make a huge difference in the overall photographs. Works okay, but not amazing. If you have a few spare dollars to experiment with different equipment, this is a good starter piece.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: What A Difference This Softbox Makes!
customer_reviews.text: I have seen them, but never tried one. I am amazed at how much difference using one makes in my flash photography. The one I purchased from Digital Goja is really nice. It actually is a lot nicer than it looks in the picture on Amazon's website. The company has been great to do business with. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wood

customer_reviews.title: I hate direct flash
customer_reviews.text: I hate direct flash. This gives you the effect of a soft box without the bulk. Easily mounts to an Olympus FL-50 Flash.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Speedlight Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a Speedlight for my DSLR but found some of the shots blown out with too much light. I bought this inexpensive one-size-fits-all attachment and the results, in particular for what it cost, were great. It also folds up small and doesn't take up much room in my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin T.

customer_reviews.title: I got the 3 pack, Large/Medium/Small and whoa. ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the 3 pack, Large/Medium/Small and whoa.. Large is really really large! Only the medium and small fits in my oversized camera bag, so that's all I carry. On the con side, the system does fit well but there isn't any real support to hold the diffuser in place. You kind of have to fiddle with it, over correcting to see if it will retain its shape. Not worth a star though, so it stays at 5.
customer_reviews.author: eduncan911

customer_reviews.title: Softbox works well if it would just stay pointed in the right direction instead of drooping
customer_reviews.text: The "neck" of this modifier is not stiff enough keep the softbox pointed in the right direction. Although the softbox doesn't loose it's shape the whole things just droops and points at the floor after a few minutes. Why not fix this with a rigid plastic plate on the left and right at the apex where it opens up into the softbox? It would be colapsible still but consistantly usable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McNeill

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this product! I did a lot of research on flash diffusers for speedlites and this one stood out above the rest. The quality is excellent, it easily fits around my speedlite and the velco strap keeps it in place with no problem and no slippage, and the pouch that comes with it is an added bonus! I've been using it as bounce flash so far and the light diffusion is perfect, whether you use it horizontal or vertical. I'm very impressed with this product and I highly recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a KEEPER - Can't go wrong with this diffuser!
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made and does a better job than any small lightbox I have used on a flash. It packs away very small and the pouch it great. The box is so well thought out, fits great, and is obviously durable, yet so inexpensive. So easy to use, you will use it more than you think. Excellent pro quality AND Very Inexpensive (rare combo).
customer_reviews.author: P. Tuggle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed for my external camera flash
customer_reviews.text: I got the smaller 6 x 5 one and it works great with my external flash. I have a Canon EOS XS. Some people were talking about it not staying open, it may be the size ratio to the flash, I did not have this issue. Came fast and was not to large. Works great on the external flash.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect softbox diffuser for my flash.
customer_reviews.text: Shot with this diffuser many times and it produces a nice, consistent spread of light when using a flash. It also collapses so it's easy to store in any sized camera bag. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to use something other than the default bounce card that comes on an external flash.
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this flash diffuser because it's very light and is easy to use. I like to take macro pictures and this works great for me because it does not add any weight to my equipment. It is also great for portrait.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory V. Gangitano

customer_reviews.title: Visual appearance?
customer_reviews.text: Wish the side panels would hold their shape better, as it looks like in the ad photo when pulling the elastic strap around the flash head. It is the one designated for the Canon flashes, so it did surprise me when it crippled up on the sides. It does not inhibit the functionality of its purpose, just looks less than professional. Maybe they could stitch stiffeners into the side panels and still be able to fold it to fit in the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: quality inexpensive addition
customer_reviews.text: Works well for nice quality portrait style pictures, however I had a difficult time fitting in onto my external flash. When in place, it works well, but it frequently takes some time to get it adjusted and where I want it. I used it at a wedding and felt like some shot opportunities passed while trying to adjust it. One there, the shots turned out beautifully. Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Somehow better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Somehow better than I expected. I was worried it wouldn't hold its shape properly, but it actually does really well. It can get a little creased folding up, but it has never caused an obstruction of the light for me. Comes with a nice little case to keep it safe and I put my speed light color gels in that case as well. I'm planning to use this to shoot graduation portraits early next month and I anticipate it will do well. If it doesn't I'll definitely be back to describe my problem!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea I would really like this diffuser light box. It spreads the light perfectly, reduce shin and hot spots, and Velcro strap was secure. At this price if you are looking for more I don't think you are going to find it. Much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Big Fella

customer_reviews.title: Blocks the Nikon infrared Focus ability.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a smaller version because I was concerned about the nighttime focus of the Nikon Flash, using infrared technology, but it is still too large, and blocks it. I may use it on another flash some day, keeping it in the bag for now...
customer_reviews.author: kenneth jones

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: This Diffuser fits my Flashpoint Zoom TTL R2 perfectly,i've only used it once indoors and was really satisfied with the results,the real test for me will be outdoors in open shade for portraits . Its just the right size for me,and It feels and looks to be built well enough for my intended use.
customer_reviews.author: joefish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and solid construction.
customer_reviews.text: Just shot an outdoor wedding using this set. Worked perfectly to both soften and diffuse the flashes on my two Canon 600EX-RTs. Good quality construction and the elastic band held very firmly on the flash heads.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Works good....takes a good flash to blow through this though....seems like you lose some light but that is to be expected....good product and construction though!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Does what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: For the size, packability and ease of installing (not to mention the price) - I get it why it's popular and well-reviewed. It's not really a big diffusion source, but it does ease the edge off flash on people a bit.
customer_reviews.author: M. CarterTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: It does the job but it falls off a lot, almost lost it twice because it fell off while walking and I didn’t know. Also covers my speed light screen when it’s on so I can’t see it when I need to check things or change settings.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Softbox great price 👍
customer_reviews.text: Like this Flash Diffuser Light Softbox 6x5" by Altura Photo. It's Universal, Collapsible and comes with Storage Pouch. Fits my Canon 580EX Speedlight perfectly. Photos using softbox come out nicely and not harsh like before. Great product and not expensive 👌
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Snug
customer_reviews.text: A no nonsense and well-made flash diffuser. I used it this morning for a quick photo shoot where I needed just a skooch of fill light. It diffused the otherwise harsh flash light as intended. With its elastic velcro belt, it fits on the flash snug as a bug in a rug and makes it versatile enough to work on any brand flash.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer Torquemada

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and works as designed
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect easy to use and carry soft box for an on camera flash. I love it and use it for many uses from filol flash, to macro photos. Works very well. I'd love to see an option with a set of internal 1/4-1 stop difusers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: It fit my Nikon SB - 700 just fine.  Was worried about how snug it would fit. That's fine also.
customer_reviews.text: Not a professional. Use this product for outdoor photos of just general subjects. Mostly my grandaughter. Its works great for backlight by the sun or in the shade. I thought it would be too small. It works just fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: dynaman04

customer_reviews.title: The softbox tends to collapse.  Wish it came with stiffener rods.
customer_reviews.text: The sides tend to collapse. Going to return it. Needs a better design to avoid folding in on itself.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Creates harsh shadows!
customer_reviews.text: I tested the Flash Diffuser Light Softbox 11x8” by Altura Photo and found that it produced harsh shadows. I did not see that it really diffused light. I adjusted the head of the speedlight up and down but could not get rid of the shadows. I wanted something that evenly spreads light.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Good small diffuser
customer_reviews.text: The item is lightweight yet nicely constructed.It is held on by an elastic velcro strap that holds the rubberized sleeve to the flash. It does not block the focus assist light when mounted on my Canon G16 with a 320EX speedlight. As shown in the company Youtube video, there is an internal diffusion flap that can be velcroed in front of the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great flash Diffuser
customer_reviews.text: Great flash Diffuser. I'm been using this for a few months now and love it. It does a great job and helps with the harshness of a standard flash. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerofStuff

customer_reviews.title: Dimming vs softening
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but I feel like it basically dims my flash vs softens it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, does the job well
customer_reviews.text: I love how this diffuser folds up and doesn't take up much room in my bag. It's easy to put on the flash, and it stays in place securely. I've found it to be durable and it diffuses the light well.
customer_reviews.author: Mama on the Move

customer_reviews.title: Great Option When You Have to Pack Lightly
customer_reviews.text: All three softboxes help with harsh shadows, but of course the largest one offers the best effects, Don't expect any of these to equal the softness you'd get from an large umbrella or softbox, but when you can't take a studio with you, these offer a much improved lighting option. They're so much better than a simple reflector card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to my Rebel's accessory collection . Works so well I purchased a second one. An inexpensive accessory that really makes a difference in a small home studio for hobbyists
customer_reviews.author: lilibet

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was perfect and the shipper added a little bonus lens cloth
customer_reviews.text: The diffuser was exactly what I expected. Packaging was perfect and the shipper added a little bonus lens cloth, which was a nice touch. Fits my speedlight perfectly. It's a tradeoff of a smaller diffuser for easy carry and what a larger diffuser to really soften the light. I need to try it in an outside environment for fill light to really see how it will be helpful in my camera bag.
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I was going to return the item because I bought it for my B500 Nikon coolpix and of course I didn't have a horseshoe shoe to attach the sped light as it was useless at first and needed to be returned ... well I bought an attachable horseshoe for the speed light and then put this soft box onto it and works great! one! I love it 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kiera

customer_reviews.title: Great value, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product. I was able to get really nice photographs without harsh shadows and it lights up a very low light area. This is something I would completely recommend for portraits and for a low light events.
customer_reviews.author: Staphaine A. Staley

customer_reviews.title: It does an excellent job of softening the flash without dragging my unbrellas ...
customer_reviews.text: It does an excellent job of softening the flash without dragging my unbrellas and stands into the backcountry. Light and compact in my pack it improves my trail and camp photos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Photographer's opinion, it's definitely what I've been looking for. I've had my speed light for about a year now and I've needed something to better help the light distribution. I've tried everything I could until I came across these softboxes. I love that they attach to the speed light itself and I'm able to travel with it and it helps more light come into my shoots. From standard portrait photography, to my evening sessions. I'm in love. It illuminates everything and I'm so glad I purchased the set of 3!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great for on-the-go-you-never-know!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option for when you're not sure what you're going to need, because it's lightweight, it folds down easily, and comes with a 6"x7.5" zippered pouch (no added bulk to your gear bag or purse). It diffuses the flash nicely, really softening my bounced light and adding filler light. I'll add some photos when I get some that aren't of clients
customer_reviews.author: B Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this frequently for evening and night time photography and it has far exceeded my expectations. Using this product, I don't have to have such a high ISO which reduces the amount of grain in the images and I've learned so much more about my camera's settings, functions and about flash/digital photography in general.
customer_reviews.author: mgndz1013

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: For the price this soft box is well made. Folds down flat for easy storage without damage. I don't recommend it for small speed lites such as canon 270 ex as it is made for full size flashes. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: All I expected and then some!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this speed light softbox. It is well built and light weight. Fastens snugly to my speed light and does a great job softening the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Diffusers and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I used this diffuser with my Nikon D750 and a speed light SP900. I feel it did a very nice job on eliminating flash hot spots. Light distribution was even when taking pictures 10 ft away from subject with even lighting across the picture. The diffuser stores easly in any photo bad and takes only seconds to install.
customer_reviews.author: John H. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for diffusing the flash. I use this with my yongnuo speedlite! However I never use the big one so I think there needs to be a learning curve in order to know which size is best for you. The quality and design is top notch though!
customer_reviews.author: KalvinStein

customer_reviews.title: Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Bulky and difficult to put on and keep on. I wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective light modifier. Easy to put on and take off. Nice diffusion. Perfect size for single portraits.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality but certainly good enough for the average to pro-sumer photographer. Initial test shots of the dogs in a poorly lit room were great, removed all harsh shadows that were present during the initial baseline images (baselines were existing lighting and Nikon SB900 without diffuser). I used all three sizes at distances up to 10 feet (between 120 and 150mm at f8.0).
customer_reviews.author: A

product_meta.title: Flash Diffuser Light Softbox 9x7” by Altura Photo (Universal, Collapsible with Storage Pouch) for Canon, Yongnuo and Nikon Speedlight
feature_bullets: Altura Photo Softbox Flash Diffuser for Shoe Mount Flash Units.
EVEN LIGHTING: Reduces harshness and softens shadows. Features an additional internal diffuser for better wrap around light.
SIMPLE AND COMPACT: Integrated hook and loop fastener strap secures around the flash head. Folds down flat when not in use.
ONE SIZE FITS ALL: Compatible with most shoe mount flash units (including Canon Nikon Sony Olympus and more). Product Dimensions 9" x 7"
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Backed with Digital Goja 90-Day 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,083 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
